title: Bilawal expresses sorrow over loss of lives by earthquake in Morocco
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 09 (APP):Chairman Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) Bilawal Bhutto Zardari has expressed grief and sorrow over the loss of precious lives and property caused by the devastating earthquake in Morocco.
According to the press release issued by the media cell Bilawal House, he said in his message to the government and people of Morocco that he was saddened and shocked by the situation caused by the natural disaster there.
He said, “PPP and the people of Pakistan are standing with the people of a brotherly Islamic country in these difficult times.”
Bilawal Bhutto had extended his condolences to the families who lost their loved ones in the earthquake and prayed for the speedy recovery of the injured.
